comments.content:
While waiting someone better suited to critique a typeface than me, I'm giving some commentrs:   
   
I see a capital "T" too wide. Maybe you could cut the right "descending" serif and substitute it with something like the upper part of the six.   
   
That would make a weird "T" anyway, but I think the whole font is special enouogh to tolerate it.   
   
I see the "N" too wide too.   
   
Vicente   
PS And a character representing Thai currency will make it funny...
